attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make the WRU change the name of the cup between Wales and South Africa to the Ray Gravell cup in honour of the late Welsh Great.  

The Prince William cup will be of no value to the sport in the future when Prince William becomes King however the name Ray Gravell will live forever in the minds of Rugby fans throughout the globe!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
